TIP006.contentDescription: Get at least 7 hours of sleep each night.

TIP010.contentDescription: Eat a balanced breakfast to kickstart your day.

TIP007.contentDescription: Do 30 minutes of cardio three times a week.

TIP008.contentDescription: Practice mindfulness and meditation for 10 minutes daily.
